div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

div.div: Welcome to Risco R-II School District

div.noscript: Enable Javascript in your browser to view this content.

p.span: Established in 1915, Risco RII School District provides education to PreSchool through Twelfth Grade Students. Our goal as educators is to give our students the skills and knowledge needed to be productive members in our school community as well as a global society.

Our dedicated staff works hard to provide a quality education to our students, teaching them skills to prepare them for college or for the competitive job market they may enter upon graduation. Our staff is very caring and works together to meet the educational needs of our students, while creating a nurturing family style school culture.
Roughly 1,970 students have graduated from the District. We look forward to educating generations to come here at Risco RII School District, where "Students Are Achievers"!
